scenario.name: Simple UA Registeration to clearwater IMS
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:example.com;transport=tcp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/TCP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Contact: <sip:mcptt_c1@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:6505550462@example.com> From: <sip:6505550462@example.com>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: MCPTT-UA Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE,REFER Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:example.com;transport=tcp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/TCP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Contact: <sip:mcptt_c1@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:6505550462@example.com> From: <sip:6505550462@example.com>;tag=[call_number] [authentication] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: MCPTT-UA Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE,REFER Content-Length: 0
